casebody.data:
Elijah CANTY, et al.
v.
HAYES MEMORIAL UNITED HOLY CHURCH, INC., and Clifton E. Buckrham, Pastor of Hayes Memorial United Holy Church, Inc. No. 565P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 9, 2004. Frederick L. Berry, Jamie Lisa Forbes, Greensboro, for Hayes Memorial. Amiel J. Rossabi, Jason M. Goins, Asheboro, for Canty.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendants on the 2nd day of November 2004 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th day of November 2004."
